display_long_description:
**"An instant cult classic. Deceptive Reality redefines Cyberpunk VR." - XRGamer (9.5/10)**

**"Deceptive Reality blends thrilling hand-to-hand combat, immersive hacking mechanics, and a rich cyberpunk world into an exciting VR adventure." - BMFVR YouTuber**

**"Constantly updated with relentless gun-fu, immersive hacking, and deep characters make Deceptive Reality a must-play in VR."- WickedVRGamer (9/10)**

**You've been living the corporate dream, working for Cortex, the company that can create superhumans with the revolutionary brain chip.** 

Your girlfriend gets killed for telling the truth of the enormous inequality this will create. Just as you're about to meet the same fate, a mysterious hacker saves you. 

He trains you to go on vengeance.

Now, as a cyberpunk agent with nothing to lose, you must get by the neon-lit streets of Cortex City into their HQ.

# UPDATED WINTER 2024 / 2025 OUT NOW - Key Features:

# A STORY OF HUMANITY, TECHNOLOGY AND VENGEANCE
Dive into the action that asks the questions of human existence.
[media]


# CORTEX COMBAT ENGINE 2.0
Experience free-flow combat with bullet time in Kill Rooms, Story and Sandbox Mode for endless action.
[media]

# A DYNAMIC STORY 
Uncover the noir story combining VR action with comics, bringing the neon-soaked city into your living room.
[media]

# ACTION STORY OR FREE ROAM: FIGHT, HACK AND EXPLORE 
Explore more of Cortex City with new areas, epic brawls, and hidden secrets to uncover.
[media]
# PLAY NOW. IT'S TIME FOR VENGEANCE.
[media]
